heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers in the northern mountains, southern Greens, and Berkshires, with a trace to 2 inches. Temperatures nearly steady, from the upper single digits to mid teens north, and from the mid teens to around 20 in the south. West winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 35 mph, except gusting to 45 in the southern Greens and Berkshires, and possibly to 55 mph along the eastern slopes of the Berkshires.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow showers in the northern mountains, southern Greens, and Berkshires; another trace to 2 inches. Lows from zero to 10 above north, low to mid teens in the south. West winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph, except gusting to 40 in the southern Greens and Berkshires, and possibly to 50 mph along the eastern slopes of the Berkshires.

heading: Wednesday
text: Early sun giving way to increasing clouds from southwest to northeast. A rising chance of afternoon snow showers west of the Greens, chance late in the east; less than an inch. Highs from the upper teens to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 in the south. Light winds, becoming southwest 5 to 15 mph.
